entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Thunder Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:38 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -21.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Thunder Bay Airport 10:00 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -21.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 61 %
Wind Chill: -32
Dewpoint: -27.3°C
Wind: W 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 29. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
